name: Jens Krinke
content: Jens Krinke DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER SCIENCE Dr. Jens Krinke Home- Contact- Teaching- Research- Publications Jens Krinke Associate Professor Department of Computer Science University College London j.krinke@ucl.ac.uk @jkrinke@mastodon.acm.org PGP/GnuPG key Director of the Centre for Research on Evolution Search & Testing (CREST) in the Software Systems Engineering Group. Office: EFB 3.03 Teaching I am involved in teaching of the following modules: COMP0104: Tools and Environments. COMP0108: Research Methods in Software Engineering. COMP0110: Software Systems Engineering Research Project. COMP0111: Software Systems Engineering Group Project. Are you looking for a project? I supervise student's projects in the area of software analysis and can suggest appropriate topics. Please see my projects for ideas. Office hours: I have regular office hours during Term 1/2: Mondays, 5pmâ6pm â Please see the instructions for details. I have no regular office hours outside term times, please contact me via email for an appointment outside term time.
